description:
With the help of Odoru Sotoin, Manabu Sotoin’s older brother and the founder of the Pretty Boy Detective Club, Mayumi steadily gains more supporters in the election. However, the Detective Club is unable to solve Wana Nagawa’s hit-and-run case, let alone find any clues. The culprit behind the hit-and-run case is now targeting Mayumi and...!?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: The Pretty Boy on D Hill (Part 2)
